description: This is an HTML file that implements the front-end interface for a database visualizer tool. It provides a user interface with sidebar navigation for selecting databases and tables, and a main content area for displaying data tables, error messages, and loading states. It includes JavaScript code for fetching data from API endpoints, dynamically updating the DOM, and handling user interactions.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the list of databases, resets state, and updates UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the list of tables for a selected database, loads tables if needed.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches the tables for a specific database and displays them in the sidebar.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches data for a specific table and renders it in the main content area.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Constructs and displays an HTML table from data rows.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Generates the HTML for a table cell, handling object, null, or long string content.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Toggles expansion of cell content for long strings or objects.
